Message: Hi, Iâ€™m the NewsBreak Ad Assistant. How can I help?
The user completes the submission of the form

We want to run web campaigns, for web users. How can we do this? I see advertising on your site https://www.newsbreak.com but inside the campaigns I see only inapp traffic. So how can I advertise on you r web site

Hi Anna, you can definitely run web campaigns on News Break. To get started, you'll need to create a campaign and select the appropriate targeting options. Here's a step-by-step guide to help you out:
1. Access Ad Management.
2. Click 'Create Campaign.'
3. Choose the objective that aligns with your goal, such as brand awareness or website traffic.
4. Select your targeting options to reach web users.
5. Define how long you want your campaign to run and set your budget.
6. Fill in your creatives by adding a headline, body, image/video, and link to your listing.
For more detailed instructions, you can refer to this article: [How to create your first ad](https://help.newsbreak.com/hc/en-us/articles/17618196971149-How-to-create-your-first-ad).
If you have any other questions or need further assistance, feel free to ask!
see there only Android IOS traffic not desktop

I understand, Anna. It seems like you're only seeing options for Android and iOS traffic in your campaigns. To specifically target desktop users, you might need to adjust your campaign settings or reach out to our support team for more detailed assistance.
You can contact our ad support team at adsupport@newsbreak.com for help with setting up campaigns that target desktop users. They will be able to provide you with the necessary guidance and ensure your campaign reaches the desired audience.
For more information on creating ads, you can also refer to this article: [How to create your first ad](https://help.newsbreak.com/hc/en-us/articles/17618196971149-How-to-create-your-first-ad).
Let me know if there's anything else I can assist you with!
You're welcome, Anna! If you have any other questions in the future, feel free to reach out. Have a great day!
